What is the severity of the update in a specific version of the Verus CLI or GUI wallet, and why?

The update is considered CRITICAL, but not mandatory. This is because the issue fixed by this update does not expose any funds to theft or counterfeit, but rather fixes a vulnerability that an attacker may exploit to probe for information regarding a specific node's control over private keys.

Sending currencies cross-chain or converting between currencies is as easy as sending a cryptocurrency in less advanced systems today, except that the new Verus protocol enables you to include another blockchain as part of your destination and convert a fractional reserve currency to and from its reserve, according to its exact price along the way. The Public Blockchains as a Service (PBaaS) and Verus Reserve cross-chain currency conversion technology is a Technology Preview that enables anyone to make new blockchains and currencies, each with scale and operational independence, zk-SNARK privacy, automatic wallet support, and 100% liquid conversion between VRSCTEST currency at any volume.
